1035:2: vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai|
1035:3: vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai||1||
1035:4: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā|
1035:5: vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā||2||
1035:7: na janmamaraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate||3||
1035:8: bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā|
1035:9: anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācinna vidyate||4||
1035:11: na janmamaraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate||5||
1035:13: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate||6||
1035:15: kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca||7||
1035:16: saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate|
1035:17: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate||8||
1035:26: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate|
1035:30: prasajyate sa bhāvo hi nityo'nityo'tha vā bhavet||14||
1035:37: carame na niruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ|
1035:38: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ||18||
1035:42: sārdhaṃ ca mriyate yeṣu teṣu skandheṣu jāyate||20||
1035:43: evaṃ triṣvapi kāleṣu na yuktā bhavasaṃtatiḥ|
1035:44: triṣu kāleṣu yā nāsti sā kathaṃ bhavasaṃtatiḥ||21||
